price: 101 dont il ne pourra jamais se soulager. Quel terrible fardeau devra-t-il en ce Jour porter,
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
